Methods in edu.bonn.cs.wmp.application with parameters of type ViewUpdater
 void WMPApplication.deregisterViewUpdater(ViewUpdater v)
          De-registers the given ViewUpdater, so that it gets notified on the arrival of new AwarenessEvents.
 void WMPApplication.registerViewUpdater(ViewUpdater v)
          Registers the given ViewUpdater, so that it gets notified on the arrival of new AwarenessEvents.

 class EditTextViewUpdater
          This view updater is normally used together with WMPEditText to provide this WMPView with updates from the Collaborative Editing Framework.
